text: Michael James Bryant (Mike Bryant) (born 1 May 1960, High Wycombe, Buckinghamshire, EnglandBBC Radio One, Peel Sessions Artist Page: Fluke (link).) is an English electronic musician and one of the co-founders of the electronic music group Fluke along with Jon Fugler and Mike Tournier. He first met with other members of Fluke in High Wycombe. ==Life and career== Bryant joined Fluke in 1988 at the age of 28 in Beaconsfield, Buckinghamshire.One Little Indian Records, Fluke Biography (link ). ==Notes and references== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:English keyboardists Category:Fluke (band) members
title: Mike Bryant
